name: 4H VWAP Bollinger Mean Reversion Crypto
description: Mean-reverting crypto strategy on 4-hour bars that buys when price is below lower Bollinger Band with rising VWAP & volume and sells when above the upper band with falling VWAP & volume. Positions risk 2 % of equity via fixed-fraction sizing, use a 3 % fixed (pseudo-trailing) stop-loss and a 4.5 % take-profit (1.5×R) or VWAP reversion handled inside the signal component.
